name: channel.update
description: A broadcaster updates their channel properties e.g., category, title, mature flag, broadcast, or language.

event_schema.title: Channel Update
event_schema.description: A broadcaster updates their channel properties e.g., category, title, mature flag, broadcast, or language.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcasters user ID.

is_mature.description: A boolean identifying whether the channel is flagged as mature. Valid values aretrueandfalse.

condition_schema.title: Channel Update request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Update event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get updates for.

name: channel.follow
description: A specified channel receives a follow.

event_schema.title: Channel Follow
event_schema.description: A specified channel receives a follow.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user now following the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user now following the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user now following the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

followed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the follow occurred.

condition_schema.title: Channel Follow request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Follow event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get follow notifications for.

name: channel.subscribe
description: A notification when a specified channel receives a subscriber. This does not include resubscribes.

event_schema.title: Channel Subscribe
event_schema.description: A notification when a specified channel receives a subscriber. This does not include resubscribes.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

tier.description: The tier of the subscription. Valid values are 1000, 2000, and 3000.

is_gift.description: Whether the subscription is a gift.

condition_schema.title: Channel Subscribe request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Subscribe event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get subscribe notifications for.

name: channel.subscription.end
description: A notification when a subscription to the specified channel ends.

event_schema.title: Channel Subscription End
event_schema.description: A notification when a subscription to the specified channel ends.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user whose subscription ended.

user_login.description: The user login for the user whose subscription ended.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user whose subscription ended.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID.

tier.description: The tier of the subscription that ended. Valid values are 1000, 2000, and 3000.

is_gift.description: Whether the subscription was a gift.

condition_schema.title: Channel Subscription End request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Subscription End event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get subscription end notifications for.

name: channel.subscription.gift
description: A notification when a viewer gives a gift subscription to one or more users in the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Subscription Gift
event_schema.description: A notification when a viewer gives a gift subscription to one or more users in the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user who sent the subscription gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

user_login.description: The user login of the user who sent the gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

user_name.description: The user display name of the user who sent the gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID.

total.description: The number of subscriptions in the subscription gift.

tier.description: The tier of subscriptions in the subscription gift.

cumulative_total.description: The number of subscriptions gifted by this user in the channel. This value is null for anonymous gifts or if the gifter has opted out of sharing this information.

is_anonymous.description: Whether the subscription gift was anonymous.

condition_schema.title: Channel Subscription Gift request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Subscription Gift event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get subscription gift notifications for.

name: channel.subscription.message
description: A notification when a user sends a resubscription chat message in a specific channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Subscription Message
event_schema.description: A notification when a user sends a resubscription chat message in a specific channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user who sent a resubscription chat message.

user_login.description: The user login of the user who sent a resubscription chat message.

user_name.description: The user display name of the user who a resubscription chat message.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID.

tier.description: The tier of the users subscription.

message.description: An object that contains the resubscription message and emote information needed to recreate the message.

text.description: The text of the resubscription chat message.

emotes.description: An array that includes the emote ID and start and end positions for where the emote appears in the text.

begin.description: The index of where the Emote starts in the text.

end.description: The index of where the Emote ends in the text.

cumulative_months.description: The total number of months the user has been subscribed to the channel.

streak_months.description: The number of consecutive months the users current subscription has been active. This value is null if the user has opted out of sharing this information.

duration_months.description: The month duration of the subscription.

condition_schema.title: Channel Subscription Message request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Subscription Message event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get resubscription chat message notifications for.

name: channel.cheer
description: A user cheers on the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Cheer
event_schema.description: A user cheers on the specified channel.

is_anonymous.description: Whether the user cheered anonymously or not.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

message.description: The message sent with the cheer.

condition_schema.title: Channel Cheer request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Cheer event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get cheer notifications for.

name: channel.raid
description: A broadcaster raids another broadcasters channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Raid
event_schema.description: A broadcaster raids another broadcasters channel.

from_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster ID that created the raid.

from_broadcaster_user_login.description: The broadcaster login that created the raid.

from_broadcaster_user_name.description: The broadcaster display name that created the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster ID that received the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_login.description: The broadcaster login that received the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_name.description: The broadcaster display name that received the raid.

viewers.description: The number of viewers in the raid.

condition_schema.title: Channel Raid request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Raid event subscription

from_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID that created the channel raid you want to get notifications for. Use this parameter if you want to know when a specific broadcaster raids another broadcaster. The channel raid condition must include either from_broadcaster_user_id or to_broadcaster_user_id.

to_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID that received the channel raid you want to get notifications for. Use this parameter if you want to know when a specific broadcaster is raided by another broadcaster. The channel raid condition must include either from_broadcaster_user_id or to_broadcaster_user_id.

name: channel.ban
description: A viewer is banned from the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Ban
event_schema.description: A viewer is banned from the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

moderator_user_id.description: The user ID of the issuer of the ban.

moderator_user_login.description: The user login of the issuer of the ban.

moderator_user_name.description: The user name of the issuer of the ban.

ends_at.description: Will be null if permanent ban. If it is a timeout, this field shows when the timeout will end.

is_permanent.description: Indicates whether the ban is permanent (true) or a timeout (false). If true, ends_at will be null.

condition_schema.title: Channel Ban request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Ban event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get ban notifications for.

name: channel.unban
description: A viewer is unbanned from the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Unban
event_schema.description: A viewer is unbanned from the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user id for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

moderator_user_id.description: The user ID of the issuer of the unban.

moderator_user_login.description: The user login of the issuer of the unban.

moderator_user_name.description: The user name of the issuer of the unban.

condition_schema.title: Channel Unban request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Unban event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get unban notifications for.

name: channel.moderator.add
description: Moderator privileges were added to a user on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Moderator Add
event_schema.description: Moderator privileges were added to a user on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

user_id.description: The user ID of the new moderator.

user_login.description: The user login of the new moderator.

user_name.description: The display name of the new moderator.

condition_schema.title: Channel Moderator Add request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Moderator Add event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get moderator addition notifications for.

name: channel.moderator.remove
description: Moderator privileges were removed from a user on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Moderator Remove
event_schema.description: Moderator privileges were removed from a user on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

user_id.description: The user ID of the removed moderator.

user_login.description: The user login of the removed moderator.

user_name.description: The display name of the removed moderator.

condition_schema.title: Channel Moderator Remove request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Moderator Remove event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to get moderator removal notifications for.

name: channel.channel_points_custom_reward.add
description: A custom channel points reward has been created for the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Add
event_schema.description: A custom channel points reward has been created for the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

is_enabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled. If false, the reward wont show up to viewers.

is_paused.description: Is the reward currently paused. If true, viewers cant redeem.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

max_per_user_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per user per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

value.description: The max per user per stream limit.

background_color.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example:#FA1ED2.

image.description: Set of custom images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward. Can benullif no images have been uploaded.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

default_image.description: Set of default images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

global_cooldown.description: Whether a cooldown is enabled and what the cooldown is in seconds.

cooldown_expires_at.description: Timestamp of the cooldown expiration.nullif the reward isnt on cooldown.

redemptions_redeemed_current_stream.description: The number of redemptions redeemed during the current live stream. Counts against themax_per_streamlimit.nullif the broadcasters stream isnt live ormax_per_streamisnt enabled.

condition_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Add request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Points Custom Reward Add event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to receive channel points custom reward add notifications for.

name: channel.channel_points_custom_reward.update
description: A custom channel points reward has been updated for the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Update
event_schema.description: A custom channel points reward has been updated for the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

is_enabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled. If false, the reward wont show up to viewers.

is_paused.description: Is the reward currently paused. If true, viewers cant redeem.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

max_per_user_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per user per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

value.description: The max per user per stream limit.

background_color.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example:#FA1ED2.

image.description: Set of custom images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward. Can benullif no images have been uploaded.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

default_image.description: Set of default images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

global_cooldown.description: Whether a cooldown is enabled and what the cooldown is in seconds.

cooldown_expires_at.description: Timestamp of the cooldown expiration.nullif the reward isnt on cooldown.

redemptions_redeemed_current_stream.description: The number of redemptions redeemed during the current live stream. Counts against themax_per_streamlimit.nullif the broadcasters stream isnt live ormax_per_streamisnt enabled.

condition_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Update request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Points Custom Reward Update event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to receive channel points custom reward update notifications for.

reward_id.description: Optional. Specify a reward id to only receive notifications for a specific reward.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

condition_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Remove request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Points Custom Reward Remove event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to receive channel points custom reward remove notifications for.

reward_id.description: Optional. Specify a reward id to only receive notifications for a specific reward.

subscription_type: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Add
name: channel.channel_points_custom_reward_redemption.add
description: A viewer has redeemed a custom channel points reward on the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Add
event_schema.description: A viewer has redeemed a custom channel points reward on the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

user_id.description: User ID of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_login.description: Login of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_name.description: Display name of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_input.description: The user input provided. Empty string if not provided.

status.description: Defaults tounfulfilled. Possible values areunknown,unfulfilled,fulfilled, andcanceled.

reward.description: Basic information about the reward that was redeemed, at the time it was redeemed.

redeemed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the reward was redeemed.

condition_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Add request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Add event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to receive channel points custom reward redemption add notifications for.

reward_id.description: Optional. Specify a reward id to only receive notifications for a specific reward.

subscription_type: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Update
name: channel.channel_points_custom_reward_redemption.update
description: A redemption of a channel points custom reward has been updated for the specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Update
event_schema.description: A redemption of a channel points custom reward has been updated for the specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

user_id.description: User ID of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_login.description: Login of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_name.description: Display name of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_input.description: The user input provided. Empty string if not provided.

status.description: Will befulfilledorcanceled. Possible values areunknown,unfulfilled,fulfilled, andcanceled.

reward.description: Basic information about the reward that was redeemed, at the time it was redeemed.

redeemed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the reward was redeemed.

condition_schema.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Update request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Update event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID for the channel you want to receive channel points custom reward redemption update notifications for.

reward_id.description: Optional. Specify a reward id to only receive notifications for a specific reward.

name: channel.poll.begin
description: A poll started on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Poll Begin
event_schema.description: A poll started on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

ends_at.description: The time the poll will end.

condition_schema.title: Channel Poll Begin request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Poll Begin event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which poll begin notifications will be received.

name: channel.poll.progress
description: Users respond to a poll on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Poll Progress
event_schema.description: Users respond to a poll on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll. Includes vote counts.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

ends_at.description: The time the poll will end.

condition_schema.title: Channel Poll Progress request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Poll Progress event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which poll progress notifications will be received.

name: channel.poll.end
description: A poll ended on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Poll End
event_schema.description: A poll ended on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll. Includes vote counts.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

status.description: The status of the poll. Valid values are completed, archived, and terminated.

condition_schema.title: Channel Poll End request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Poll End event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which poll end notifications will be received.

name: channel.prediction.begin
description: A Prediction started on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Prediction Begin
event_schema.description: A Prediction started on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locks_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction will automatically lock.

condition_schema.title: Channel Prediction Begin request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Prediction Begin event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which prediction begin notifications will be received.

name: channel.prediction.progress
description: Users participated in a Prediction on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Prediction Progress
event_schema.description: Users participated in a Prediction on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locks_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction will automatically lock.

condition_schema.title: Channel Prediction Progress request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Prediction Progress event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which prediction progress notifications will be received.

name: channel.prediction.lock
description: A Prediction was locked on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Prediction Lock
event_schema.description: A Prediction was locked on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locked_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction was locked.

condition_schema.title: Channel Prediction Lock request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Prediction Lock event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which prediction lock notifications will be received.

name: channel.prediction.end
description: A Prediction ended on a specified channel.

event_schema.title: Channel Prediction End
event_schema.description: A Prediction ended on a specified channel.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The requested broadcaster ID.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

status.description: The status of the Channel Points Prediction. Valid values are resolved and canceled.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

ended_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction ended.

condition_schema.title: Channel Prediction End request arguments
condition_schema.description: Required and optional query parameters for requesting a Channel Prediction End event subscription

broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster user ID of the channel for which prediction end notifications will be received.

broadcaster_user_id.description: The ID of the broadcaster to get notified about. The ID must match the user_id in the OAuth access token.

top_contributions.description: The contributors with the most points contributed.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.
